title: Bug 45145 - Second window comes to front when using first
OB: Currently, the second window comes to the front unexpectedly when using the first window.
EB: The second window should not come to the front unless I click on the Eclipse dock icon. The only time a window should come to the front is if I click on it explicitly or if some behavior takes me to a widget in the other window.
SR: Ensure that the second window does not come to the front unless triggered by explicit user action or relevant behavior in the first window.
